function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate coordination and distribution of essential resources leading to uneven healthcare support","Impact":"Overwhelmed healthcare system, higher number of deaths, and increased risk of disease spread","Mitigation":"Establish effective coordination processes and clear communication between stakeholders, conduct joint exercises to test coordination effectiveness","Technologies":"Secure information sharing platforms, communication technologies for crisis situations","People":"General public, healthcare workers, government officials","Owner":"Government, health organizations, private entities"},{"Description":"Divergent interests of stakeholders affecting coordination and communication","Impact":"Challenges in information exchange, slower response time, and ineffective crisis management","Mitigation":"Establish clear communication processes, settle information exchange protocols, and conduct joint exercises for awareness","Technologies":"Secure information sharing platforms, communication technologies for crisis situations","People":"Government officials, private entities, critical infrastructure operators","Owner":"Government, private entities, critical infrastructure operators"},{"Description":"Lack of understanding of dependencies and interdependencies among stakeholders","Impact":"Inadequate planning and preparation for critical infrastructure protection and post-crisis activities","Mitigation":"Conduct joint exercises to raise awareness, enable entities to understand the complexity of the system, and prepare adequate plans","Technologies":"Simulation technologies, communication technologies for crisis situations, information-sharing platforms","People":"Government officials, private entities, critical infrastructure operators","Owner":"Government, private entities, critical infrastructure operators"}]}
